recipe.title: Tomato Relish
ingredients: 1 pound ripe tomatoes, finely chopped (with seeds and juices)
3 serrano chiles, seeded, finely chopped (about 2 tablespoons)
instructions: Combine tomatoes, red onion, parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, and serrano chiles in medium bowl. Season generously with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD: Can be made 4 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
